testcase.classname: To order the food in Bisto Bites application
testcase.name: To validate the login functionality of Bisto Bites with the invalid “Username” and “Password”
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the chrome browser and maximize the window..................passed When To launch the url of the Bisto Bite application........................passed When To click the Account button............................................passed And To enter the wrong Username in mobile field.............................passed And To enter the wrong Password in password field...........................passed And To click the login button...............................................passed And To check the output as Invalid Mobile No................................passed Then To close the Browser...................................................passed
